title: Twinkle Nora Rock Me!
original_name: トゥインクル NORA(ノーラ) ロック・ミー!
opening_song: "Rock Me! Rhythm & Nora (ROCK ME!~リズム&ノーラ)" by Kojima Yumi
ending_song: "Love Me! Rock 'n' Nora (LOVE ME!~ロックン・ノーラ)" by Yukio Yamagata
sinopse: Based on a 1980 manga by Mikuriya Satomi, this adaptation differs considerably from the original. The story started in its prequel was completed with this second OVA.
